name: 霍弘毅
objective: In this course we will look at ways in which the West (America, Gr. Britain, France, and Germany) imagines the East (Persia, China, India, Vietnam, Japan) or, to put it differently, the way in which the West represents the East to itself, and thus the course is as much a course in cultural miscommunication as it is in cultural communication.  The course will be a study in reality, illusion, fantasy, stereotype, desire, deconstruction, globalism, eco-theory, and ideology.
